articles.title: Ten dead in Austria school shooting
articles.description: Police say the gunman is among the dead, but is not clear if he was a current or former student at the school.
articles.content:

articles.title: Health experts seek adoption of Morocco's risk reduction strategy
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines--Morocco's innovative implementation of strategies to reduce health risks can serve as a model for countries in the Asia-Pacific region, where outdated policies continue to hinder progress in public health, Filipino health experts said.

articles.description: NASA's aerogel, once used to catch comet dust, is now redefining fashion, captured as the glowing, weightless ‘sky in a bag’ accessory. | Fashion Trends

articles.title: Paramount to cut 3% of U.S. workforce as it deepens cost-cutting
articles.description: It's the latest round of layoffs at Paramount as it contends with cord-cutting and prepares to merge with Skydance Media.
articles.content:
Paramount Global is cutting its U.S.-based staff by 3.5%, or several hundred employees, in the latest round of layoffs at the media company as it contends with the decline of the traditional pay-TV bundle and macroeconomic headwinds.

articles.description: The IDF said that the explosive power of the sea-to-land missiles would leave a mark and promote a different kind of deterrence than bombs from the air.
articles.content:
